title: 565: Why Your Social Media Strategy Isn’t Working—and How to Fix It
description: Today, we’re continuing on with our multi part series on how to create content to promote your business.   In this episode, you’ll learn how to use social media to grow your brand. What You’ll Learn The right and wrong way to use social media The best social media platform for promotion What it takes to be successful Sponsors SellersSummit.com – The Sellers Summit is the ecommerce conference that I’ve run for the past 8 years. It’s small and intimate and you’ll learn a ton! Click Here To Grab The Recordings.
